channel.title: How to get less lagg?
channel.description:
i was wondering...my client starts lagging with only 5 persons online, before i had more than 20 online without any lagg. i want to know; how do i get less lagg, or what makes the lagg? :|
what it cant be is the amount of objects/monsters added, i only deleted monsters since the population did go from 20-5. And the objects couldn't really be the problem, because i have only 8 objects added and they are not at the same place, all spreaded out over the server.
and i have another question; If i delete objects (just the default objects like fountains etc.), will there be less lagg? i would delete them with the 'deletethatobject' void, that isn't the wrong thing to do when deleting, right?
thanx in advance :P

item.title: How to get less lagg?
item.dc:creator: @c_ya c ya
item.description:
@c_ya wrote:

Mabe someone in those 5 ppl are massing…?

Read full topic

item.title: How to get less lagg?
item.dc:creator: @Click_Here Click Here
item.description:
@Click_Here wrote:

umm u cant really get less lag. it just lags alot if theres:
1.lots of players
2.spamming ice barrage spell. thats y u c most servers dont use ice barrage

so there realyl isnt a way to get less lag. soz

Read full topic

i was wondering…my client starts lagging with only 5 persons online, before i had more than 20 online without any lagg. i want to know; how do i get less lagg, or what makes the lagg?
